channel.title: FlareSoft
channel.description:
So some quick questions.
1. How do i change XP rates? Im not going to have players camp all week to get 99 strength.
2. Enabling drops? Im hearing FlareSoft drops are disabled, how can i enable them?
Thank you for your help.
